document_name_accent: hoi chung suy giam mien dich.json
document_title: What is immunodeficiency syndrome? Causes and symptoms
subsection_content:
Weakened immune system makes the body unable to protect itself against attacks from bacteria and viruses, making it susceptible to infection. Even inflammatory diseases that normal people are not infected with can still be contracted by people with weakened immune systems. People with immunodeficiency disorders are susceptible to infections, they experience inflammation from time to time, such as:
Pink eyes; Sinusitis; Oral thrush; Cold; Gingivitis; Pneumonia; Yeast infection.
subsection_title: hoi chung suy giam mien dich.json. Symptoms of immune system deficiency disease
